title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: When running the report, the original chart instance in the report design handle is not modified. This issue occurs in my application where I obtain the design time instance of the chart and then call a method to run the report.
EB: The chart should be bound with data after running the report, as it was in previous versions of BIRT (up to BIRT 2.0M3). However, in BIRT RC and 2.0 versions, the chart remains unchanged.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Obtain the design time instance of a chart.
2. Run the report using a method.
3. Verify that the chart instance in the report design handle is not modified.
